A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm sorry for all the people that didn't like this movie. I'm really sorry.
For me\, that didn't have any particular expectations\, didn't know a single thing about the movie (I avoided spoilers at all cost\, didn't even see any trailer) it was an enjoyable experience.
Yes\, it did have flaws\, but I was able to surf above them and enjoy myself.
Now I reading reviews and I can't feel anything but sorry for how people have evolved when watching movies. There isn't any more "I don't like this". "It's always they fucked it up". :(
I do prefer to understand that I don't sail the ship. I just enjoy the ride.
